abilities.description:
When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} by holding a foe at bay using your spear’s reach, roll +iron or +edge. If you score a hit, you may…

  • Iron: @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} (if you have initiative) or @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} now, and add +1.
  • Edge: Take +1 momentum.

When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} in close combat, you may attempt to drive your spear home (decide before rolling). If you do, add +1 and inflict +2 harm on a hit. If you score a hit and the fight continues, @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} +iron to recover your spear.
When you @Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by bracing your spear against a charging foe, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
